title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 872.1 - Regulations generally
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 872.1 - Regulations generally

State Regulations

The uses of land within a flood hazard area shall be
subject to regulation within one of the following categories: (a) prohibited uses; (b) permitted uses generally; and
(c) uses by special
permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
872.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
